attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in Corbyn as leader of the Labour party.
attributes.background: A vote of no confidence in Corbyn as leader of the Labour party after his lacklustre EU campaign and failure to get Labour voters to vote remain in key heart lands such as Sunderland were EU has provided jobs through Nissan investment as he is a supporter of Brexit

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
